name: Acid Arrow
description: An arrow of acid springs from your hand and speeds to its target dealing 2d4 points of acid damage.

name: Acid Fog
description: Acid fog creates a billowing mass of highly acidic misty vapors, slowing down creatures and obscuring sight and deals 2d6 points of acid damage.

name: Acid Splash
description: You fire a small orb of acid at the target dealing 1d3 points of acid damage.

name: Aid
description: Aid grants +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves vs fear effects, plus 1d8 + (min(CASTERLEVEL,10)) temporary hit points.

name: Air Walk
description: The subject can tread on air as if walking on solid ground.

name: Alarm
description: Alarm creates a subtle ward on an area you select.

name: Align Weapon
description: Align weapon makes a weapon chaotic, evil, good, or lawful, as you choose.

name: Alter Self
description: You can assume the form of any Small or Medium creature of the humanoid type.

name: Analyze Dweomer
savingThrow: None or Will negates, see text
description: You can observe magical auras.

name: Animal Growth
description: The target animal grows to twice its normal size and eight times its normal weight.

name: Animal Messenger
description: You compel a Tiny animal to go to a spot you designate.

name: Animal Shapes
description: You change the form of up to (CASTERLEVEL) willing creatures into an animal of your choice.

name: Animal Trance
description: Your swaying motions and music (or singing, or chanting) compel animals and magical beasts to do nothing but watch you.

name: Animate Dead
description: Turns corpses into undead skeletons or zombies that obey your spoken commands.

name: Animate Objects
description: You imbue inanimate objects with mobility and a semblance of life.

name: Animate Plants
duration: CL rounds or CL hours; see text
description: You imbue inanimate plants with mobility and a semblance of life.

name: Animate Rope
description: You can animate a nonliving rope-like object.

name: Antilife Shell
description: You bring into being a mobile, hemispherical energy field that prevents the entrance of most types of living creatures.

name: Antimagic Field
description: An invisible barrier impervious to most magical effects surrounds you and moves with you.

name: Antipathy
description: You cause an object or location to emanate magical vibrations that repel either a specific kind of intelligent creature or creatures of a particular alignment.

name: Antiplant Shell
description: The antiplant shell spell creates an invisible, mobile barrier that keeps all creatures within the shell protected from attacks by plant creatures or animated plants.

name: Arcane Eye
description: You create an invisible magical sensor that sends you visual information.

name: Arcane Lock
description: An arcane lock spell cast upon a door, chest, or portal magically locks it.

name: Arcane Mark
description: This spell allows you to inscribe your personal rune or mark.

name: Arcane Sight
description: This spell makes your eyes glow blue and allows you to see magical auras within 120 feet of you.

name: Arcane Sight (Greater)
description: This spell functions like arcane sight, except that you automatically know which spells or magical effects are active upon any individual or object you see.

name: Astral Projection
description: By freeing your spirit from your physical body, this spell allows you to project an astral body onto another plane altogether.

name: Atonement
description: This spell removes the burden of misdeeds from the subject.

name: Augury
description: An augury can tell you whether a particular action will bring good or bad results for you in the immediate future.

name: Awaken
description: You awaken a tree or animal to human-like sentience.

name: Baleful Polymorph
savingThrow: Fortitude negates, Will partial, see text
description: As beast shape III, except that you change the subject into a Small or smaller animal of no more than 1 HD.

name: Bane
description: Bane fills your enemies with fear and doubt.

name: Banishment
description: A banishment spell enables you to force extraplanar creatures out of your home plane.

name: Barkskin
description: Barkskin toughens a creature's skin granting a +(min(max((CASTERLEVEL/3)+1,2),5)) enhancement bonus to the creature's existing natural armor bonus.

name: Bear's Endurance
description: The affected creature gains greater vitality and stamina granting the subject a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution.

name: Bear's Endurance (Mass)
description: Mass Bear's Endurance works like Bear's Endurance, except that it affects multiple creatures.

name: Beast Shape I
description: When you cast this spell, you can assume the form of any Small or Medium creature of the animal type.

name: Beast Shape II
description: This spell functions as beast shape I, except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Tiny or Large creature of the animal type.

name: Beast Shape III
description: This spell functions as beast shape II, except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Diminutive or Huge creature of the animal type.

name: Beast Shape IV
description: This spell functions as beast shape III except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Tiny or Large creature of the magical beast type.

name: Bestow Curse
description: You place a curse on the subject.

name: Binding
description: A binding spell creates a magical restraint to hold a creature.

name: Black Tentacles
description: This spell causes a field of rubbery black tentacles to appear, burrowing up from the floor and reaching for any creature in the area.

name: Blade Barrier
savingThrow: Reflex half or Reflex negates; see text
description: An immobile, vertical curtain of whirling blades shaped of pure force springs into existence dealing (min(15,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of damage to any creature passing through.

name: Blasphemy
description: Any nonevil creature within the area of a blasphemy spell suffers ill effects.

name: Bleed
description: You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying.

name: Bless
description: Bless fills your allies with courage.

name: Bless Water
description: This transmutation imbues a flask of water with positive energy, turning it into holy water.

name: Bless Weapon
description: This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes.

name: Blindness/Deafness
description: You call upon the powers of unlife to render the subject blinded or deafened, as you choose.

name: Blink
description: You "blink" quickly back and forth between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane and look as though you're winking in and out of reality at random.

name: Blight
description: This spell withers a single plant of any size.

name: Blur
description: The subject's outline appears blurred, shifting, and wavering granting the subject concealment (20%% miss chance).

name: Break Enchantment
description: This spell frees victims from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

name: Breath of Life
savingThrow: Will negates (harmless) or Will half, see text
description: This spell cures 5d8+(min(CASTERLEVEL,25)) points of damage

name: Bull's Strength
description: The subject becomes stronger granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.

name: Bull's Strength (Mass)
description: This spell functions like bull's strength, except that it affects multiple creatures.

name: Burning Hands
description: A cone of searing flame shoots from your fingertips dealing (min(5,CASTERLEVEL))d4 points of fire damage to any creature in the effect area.

name: Call Lightning
description: Immediately upon completion of the spell, and once per round thereafter, you may call down a 5-foot-wide, 30-foot-long, vertical bolt of lightning that deals 3d6 points of electricity damage.

name: Call Lightning Storm
description: This spell functions like call lightning, except that each bolt deals 5d6 points of electricity damage (or 5d10 if created outdoors in a stormy area), and you may call a maximum of 15 bolts.

name: Calm Animals
description: This spell soothes and quiets animals, rendering them docile and harmless.

name: Calm Emotions
description: This spell calms agitated creatures.

name: Cat's Grace
description: The transmuted creature becomes more graceful, agile, and coordinated granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

name: Cat's Grace (Mass)
description: This spell functions like cat's grace, except that it affects multiple creatures.

name: Cause Fear
description: The affected creature becomes frightened.

name: Chain Lightning
description: This spell creates an electrical discharge that begins as a single stroke commencing from your fingertips.

name: Changestaff
description: You change a specially prepared quarterstaff into a Huge treantlike creature.

name: Chaos Hammer
description: You unleash chaotic power to smite your enemies in the form of a multicolored explosion of leaping, ricocheting energy.

name: Charm Animal
description: This spell functions like charm person, except that it affects a creature of the animal type.

name: Charm Monster
description: This spell functions like charm person, except that the effect is not restricted by creature type or size.

name: Charm Monster (Mass)
description: This spell functions like charm monster, except that mass charm monster affects a number of creatures whose combined HD do not exceed twice your level, or at least one creature regardless of HD.

name: Charm Person
description: This charm makes a humanoid creature regard you as its trusted friend and ally.

name: Chill Metal
description: Chill metal makes metal extremely cold.

name: Chill Touch
savingThrow: Fortitude partial or Will negates; see text
description: A touch from your hand, which glows with blue energy, disrupts the life force of living creatures dealing 1d6 points of damage.

name: Circle of Death
description: Circle of death snuffs out the life force of living creatures, killing them instantly.

name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
description: Clairaudience/clairvoyance creates an invisible magical sensor at a specific location that enables you to hear or see almost as if you were there.

name: Clenched Fist
description: This spell functions like interposing hand, except that the hand can also push or strike one opponent that you select.

name: Cloak of Chaos
description: A random pattern of color surrounds the subjects, protecting them from attacks, granting them resistance to spells cast by lawful creatures, and causing lawful creatures that strike the subjects to become confused.

name: Clone
description: This spell makes an inert duplicate of a creature.

name: Cloudkill
description: This spell generates a bank of fog, similar to a fog cloud, except that its vapors are yellowish green and poisonous.

name: Color Spray
description: A vivid cone of clashing colors springs forth from your hand, causing creatures to become stunned, perhaps also blinded, and possibly knocking them unconscious.

name: Command
description: You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity.

name: Command (Greater)
description: This spell functions like command, except that up to (CASTERLEVEL) creatures may be affected, and the activities continue beyond 1 round.

name: Command Plants
description: This spell allows you some degree of control over one or more plant creatures.

name: Command Undead
description: This spell allows you a degree of control over an undead creature.

name: Commune
description: You contact your deity--or agents thereof--and ask questions that can be answered by a simple yes or no.

name: Commune with Nature
description: You become one with nature, attaining knowledge of the surrounding territory.

name: Comprehend Languages
description: You can understand the spoken words of creatures or read otherwise incomprehensible written messages.

name: Cone of Cold
description: Cone of cold creates an area of extreme cold, originating at your hand and extending outward in a cone, dealing (min(15,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of cold damage.

name: Confusion
description: This spell causes confusion in the targets, making them unable to determine their actions.

name: Confusion (Lesser)
description: This spell causes a single creature to become confused for 1 round.

name: Consecrate
description: This spell blesses an area with positive energy.

name: Contact Other Plane
description: You send your mind to another plane of existence in order to receive advice and information from powers there.

name: Contagion
description: The subject contracts a disease.

name: Contingency
description: You can place another spell upon your person so that it comes into effect under some condition you dictate when casting contingency.

name: Continual Flame
description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch.

name: Control Plants
description: This spell enables you to control the actions of one or more plant creatures for a short period of time.

name: Control Undead
description: This spell enables you to control undead creatures for a short period of time.

name: Control Water
description: This spell has two different applications, both of which control water in different ways.

name: Control Weather
description: You change the weather in the local area.

name: Control Winds
description: You alter wind force in the area surrounding you.

name: Create Food and Water
description: The food that this spell creates is simple fare of your choice--highly nourishing, if rather bland.

name: Create Greater Undead
description: This spell functions like create undead, except that you can create more powerful and intelligent sorts of undead.

name: Create Undead
description: A much more potent spell than animate dead, this evil spell allows you to infuse a dead body with negative energy to create more powerful sorts of undead.

name: Create Water
description: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.

name: Creeping Doom
description: This spell summons four massive swarms of biting and stinging insects.

name: Crushing Despair
description: An invisible cone of despair causes great sadness in the subjects.

name: Crushing Hand
description: This spell functions as interposing hand, except that it can also grapple one opponent as grasping hand.

name: Cure Critical Wounds
description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 4d8+(min(20,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

name: Cure Critical Wounds (Mass)
description: You channel positive energy to cure 4d8+(min(40,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage points on each selected creature.

name: Cure Light Wounds
description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+(min(5,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

name: Cure Light Wounds (Mass)
savingThrow: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
description: You channel positive energy to cure 1d8+(min(25,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage points on each selected creature.

name: Cure Moderate Wounds
savingThrow: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+(min(10,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

name: Cure Moderate Wounds (Mass)
description: You channel positive energy to cure 2d8+(min(30,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage points on each selected creature.

name: Cure Serious Wounds
savingThrow: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 3d8+(min(15,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

name: Cure Serious Wounds (Mass)
description: You channel positive energy to cure 3d8+(min(35,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage points on each selected creature.

name: Curse Water
description: This spell imbues a flask (1 pint) of water with negative energy, turning it into unholy water.

name: Dancing Lights
description: You create up to four lights that resemble lanterns or torches.

name: Darkness
description: This spell causes an object to radiate darkness out to a 20-foot radius.

name: Darkvision
description: The subject gains the ability to see 60 feet even in total darkness.

name: Daylight
description: You touch an object when you cast this spell, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius.

name: Daze
description: This spell clouds the mind of a humanoid creature with 4 or fewer Hit Dice so that it takes no actions.

name: Daze Monster
description: This spell functions like daze, but it can affect any one living creature of any type.

name: Death Knell
duration: Instantaneous/10 minutes per HD of subject; see text
description: You draw forth the ebbing life force of a creature and use it to fuel your own power.

name: Death Ward
description: The subject gains a +4 morale bonus on saves against all death spells and magical death effects.

name: Deathwatch
description: Using the powers of necromancy, you can determine the condition of creatures near death within the spell's range.

name: Deep Slumber
description: This spell functions like sleep, except that it affects 10 HD of targets.

name: Deeper Darkness
description: This spell functions as darkness, except that objects radiate darkness in a 60-foot radius and the light level is lowered by two steps.

name: Delay Poison
description: The subject becomes temporarily immune to poison.

name: Delayed Blast Fireball
description: This spell functions like fireball, except that it is more powerful and can detonate up to 5 rounds after the spell is cast.

name: Demand
description: This spell functions like sending, but the message can also contain a suggestion (see the suggestion spell), which the subject does its best to carry out.

name: Desecrate
description: This spell imbues an area with negative energy.

name: Destruction
description: This spell instantly delivers (CASTERLEVEL*10) points of damage.

name: Detect Animals or Plants
description: You can detect a particular kind of animal or plant in a cone emanating out from you in whatever direction you face.

name: Detect Chaos
description: You can sense the auras of chaotic creatures.

name: Detect Evil
description: You can sense the presence of evil.

name: Detect Good
description: You can sense the presence of good.

name: Detect Law
description: You can sense the auras of lawful creatures.

name: Detect Magic
description: You detect magical auras.

name: Detect Poison
description: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.

name: Detect Scrying
description: You immediately become aware of any attempt to observe you by means of a divination [scrying] spell or effect.

name: Detect Secret Doors
description: You can detect secret doors, compartments, caches, and so forth.

name: Detect Snares and Pits
description: You can detect simple pits, deadfalls, and snares as well as mechanical traps constructed of natural materials.

name: Detect Thoughts
description: You detect surface thoughts.

name: Detect Undead
description: You can detect the aura that surrounds undead creatures.

name: Dictum
savingThrow: None or Will negates; see text
description: Any nonlawful creature within the area of a dictum spell suffers ill effects.

name: Dimension Door
description: You instantly transfer yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.

name: Dimensional Anchor
description: A green ray springs from your hand, any creature or object struck by the ray is covered with a shimmering emerald field that completely blocks extradimensional travel.

name: Dimensional Lock
description: You create a shimmering emerald barrier that completely blocks extradimensional travel.

name: Diminish Plants
description: This spell has two versions: Prune Growth and Stunt Growth.

name: Discern Lies
description: You know if the target deliberately and knowingly speaks a lie by discerning disturbances in its aura caused by lying.

name: Discern Location
description: A discern location spell is among the most powerful means of locating creatures or objects.

name: Disguise Self
description: You make yourself--including clothing, armor, weapons, and equipment--look different.

name: Disintegrate
description: A thin, green ray springs from your pointing finger dealing (min(40,CASTERLEVEL*2))d6 points of damage.

name: Dismissal
description: This spell forces an extraplanar creature back to its proper plane if it fails a Will save.

name: Dispel Chaos
duration: CL rounds or until discharged, whichever comes first
description: Shimmering, blue lawful energy surrounds you granting a +4 deflection bonus to AC against attacks by chaotic creatures and you can choose to drive chaotic creatures back to their home plane on making a successful melee touch attack.

name: Dispel Evil
duration: CL rounds or until discharged, whichever comes first
description: Shimmering, white holy energy surrounds you granting a +4 deflection bonus to AC against attacks by evil creatures and you can choose to drive evil creatures back to their home plane on making a successful melee touch attack.

name: Dispel Good
duration: CL rounds or until discharged, whichever comes first
description: Dark, wavering unholy energy surrounds you granting a +4 deflection bonus to AC against attacks by good creatures and you can choose to drive good creatures back to their home plane on making a successful melee touch attack.

name: Dispel Law
duration: CL rounds or until discharged, whichever comes first
description: Flickering, yellow chaotic energy surrounds you granting a +4 deflection bonus to AC against attacks by lawful creatures and you can choose to drive lawful creatures back to their home plane on making a successful melee touch attack.

name: Dispel Magic
description: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing spell that has been cast on a creature or object, to temporarily suppress the magical abilities of a magic item, or to counter another spellcaster's spell.

name: Dispel Magic (Greater)
description: This spell functions like dispel magic, except that it can end more than one spell on a target and it can be used to target multiple creatures.

name: Displacement
description: The subject of this spell appears to be about 2 feet away from its true location granting a 50%% miss chance as if it had total concealment.

name: Disrupt Undead
description: You direct a ray of positive energy dealing 1d6 points of damage to Undead.

name: Disrupting Weapon
description: This spell makes a melee weapon deadly to undead.

name: Divination
description: A divination spell can provide you with a useful piece of advice in reply to a question concerning a specific goal, event, or activity that is to occur within 1 week.

name: Divine Favor
description: Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +(max(1,min(3,floor(CASTERLEVEL/3)))) luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls.

name: Divine Power
description: You imbue yourself with strength and skill in combat and gain a +(max(1,min(6,floor(CASTERLEVEL/3)))) luck bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, Strength checks, and Strength-based skill checks.

name: Dominate Animal
description: This spell allows you to enchant the targeted animal and direct it with simple commands such as "Attack," "Run," and "Fetch".

name: Dominate Monster
description: This spell functions like dominate person, except that the spell is not restricted by creature type.

name: Dominate Person
description: You can control the actions of any humanoid creature through a telepathic link that you establish with the subject's mind.

name: Doom
description: This spell fills a single subject with a feeling of horrible dread that causes it to become shaken.

name: Dream
description: You, or a messenger you touch, send a message to others in the form of a dream.

name: Eagle's Splendor
description: The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

name: Eagle's Splendor (Mass)
description: This spell functions like eagle's splendor, except that it affects multiple creatures.

name: Earthquake
description: When you cast earthquake, an intense but highly localized tremor rips the ground.

name: Elemental Body I
description: When you cast this spell, you can assume the form of a Small air, earth, fire, or water elemental.

name: Elemental Body II
description: This spell functions as elemental body I, except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Medium air, earth, fire, or water elemental.

name: Elemental Body III
description: This spell functions as elemental body II, except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Large air, earth, fire, or water elemental.

name: Elemental Body IV
description: This spell functions as elemental body III, except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Huge air, earth, fire, or water elemental.

name: Elemental Swarm
description: This spell opens a portal to an Elemental Plane and summons elementals from it.

name: Endure Elements
description: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.

name: Energy Drain
savingThrow: Fortitude partial; see text for enervation
description: This spell functions like enervation, except that the creature struck gains 2d4 temporary negative levels.

name: Enervation
description: You point your finger and fire a black ray of negative energy that suppresses the life force of any living creature it strikes dealing 1d4 temporary negative levels if you hit.

name: Enlarge Person
description: This spell causes instant growth of a humanoid creature, doubling its height and multiplying its weight by 8.

name: Enlarge Person (Mass)
description: This spell functions like enlarge person, except that it affects multiple creatures.

name: Entangle
description: This spell causes tall grass, weeds, and other plants to wrap around foes in the area of effect or those that enter the area.

name: Enthrall
description: If you have the attention of a group of creatures, you can use this spell to hold them enthralled.

name: Entropic Shield
description: A magical field appears around you, glowing with a chaotic blast of multicolored hues deflecting incoming arrows, rays, and other ranged attacks.

name: Erase
description: Erase removes writings of either magical or mundane nature from a scroll or from one or two pages of paper, parchment, or similar surfaces.

name: Ethereal Jaunt
description: You become ethereal, along with your equipment.

name: Etherealness
description: This spell functions like ethereal jaunt, except that you and other willing creatures joined by linked hands become ethereal.

name: Expeditious Retreat
description: This spell increases your base land speed by 30 feet.

name: Explosive Runes
description: You trace mystic runes upon a book, map, scroll, or similar object bearing written information which detonate when read, dealing 6d6 points of force damage.

name: Eyebite
description: Each round, you can target a single living creature, striking it with waves of power.

name: Fabricate
description: You convert material of one sort into a product that is of the same material.

name: Faerie Fire
description: A pale glow surrounds and outlines the subjects who shed light as candles.

name: False Life
duration: CL hours or until discharged; see text
description: You harness the power of unlife to grant yourself a limited ability to avoid death.

name: False Vision
description: This spell creates a subtle illusion, causing any divination [scrying] spell used to view anything within the area of this spell to instead receive a false image (as the major image spell), as defined by you at the time of casting.

name: Fear
duration: CL rounds or 1 round; see text
description: An invisible cone of terror causes each living creature in the area to become panicked unless it succeeds on a Will save.

name: Feather Fall
description: The affected creatures or objects fall slowly.

name: Feeblemind
description: Target creature's Intelligence and Charisma scores each drop to 1.

name: Find the Path
description: The recipient of this spell can find the shortest, most direct physical route to a prominent specified destination, such as a city, keep, lake, or dungeon.

name: Find Traps
description: You gain intuitive insight into the workings of traps.

name: Finger of Death
description: This spell instantly delivers (CASTERLEVEL*10) points of damage.

name: Fire Shield
description: This spell wreathes you in flame and causes damage to each creature that attacks you in melee protecting you from either cold-based or fire-based attacks.

name: Fire Seeds
savingThrow: None or Reflex half; see text
description: Depending on the version of fire seeds you choose, you turn acorns into splash weapons that you or another character can throw, or you turn holly berries into bombs that you can detonate on command.

name: Fire Storm
description: When a fire storm spell is cast, the whole area is shot through with sheets of roaring flame.

name: Fire Trap
description: Fire trap creates a fiery explosion when an intruder opens the item that the trap protects.

name: Fireball
description: A fireball spell generates a searing explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals (min(10,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of fire damage to every creature within the area.

name: Flame Arrow
description: This spell allows you to turn ammunition (such as arrows, crossbow bolts, shuriken, and sling stones) into fiery projectiles.

name: Flame Blade
description: A 3-foot-long, blazing beam of red-hot fire springs forth from your hand.

name: Flame Strike
description: A flame strike evokes a vertical column of divine fire dealing (min(15,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of damage.

name: Flaming Sphere
description: A burning globe of fire rolls in whichever direction you point and burns those it strikes.

name: Flare
description: This cantrip creates a burst of light.

name: Flesh to Stone
description: The subject, along with all its carried gear, turns into a mindless, inert statue.

name: Fly
description: The subject can fly at a speed of 60 feet (or 40 feet if it wears medium or heavy armor, or if it carries a medium or heavy load).

name: Floating Disk
description: You create a slightly concave, circular plane of force that follows you about and carries loads for you.

name: Fog Cloud
description: A bank of fog billows out from the point you designate.

name: Forbiddance
description: Forbiddance seals an area against all planar travel into or within it.

name: Forcecage
description: This spell creates an immobile, invisible cubical prison composed of either bars of force or solid walls of force (your choice).

name: Forceful Hand
description: This spell functions as interposing hand, except that it can also pursue and bull rush one opponent you select.

name: Foresight
description: This spell grants you a powerful sixth sense in relation to yourself or another.

name: Form of the Dragon I
description: You become a Medium chromatic or metallic dragon.

name: Form of the Dragon II
description: This spell functions as form of the dragon I except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Large chromatic or metallic dragon.

name: Form of the Dragon III
description: This spell functions as form of the dragon II save that it also allows you to take the form of a Huge chromatic or metallic dragon.

name: Fox's Cunning
description: The target becomes smarter granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

name: Fox's Cunning (Mass)
description: This spell functions like fox's cunning, except that it affects multiple creatures.

name: Freedom
description: The subject is freed from spells and effects that restrict movement, including binding, entangle, grappling, imprisonment, maze, paralysis, petrification, pinning, sleep, slow, stunning, temporal stasis, and web.

name: Freedom of Movement
description: This spell enables you or a creature you touch to move and attack normally for the duration of the spell, even under the influence of magic that usually impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow, and web.

name: Freezing Sphere
duration: Instantaneous or CL rounds; see text
description: Freezing sphere creates a frigid globe of cold energy that streaks from your fingertips to the location you select, where it explodes in a 40-foot-radius burst, dealing (min(15,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of cold damage to each creature in the area.

name: Gaseous Form
description: The subject and all its gear become insubstantial, misty, and translucent.

name: Gate
duration: Instantaneous or concentration [up to CL rounds]; see text
description: Casting a gate spell creates an interdimensional connection between your plane of existence and a plane you specify. You may call a particular individual or kind of being through the gate.

name: Geas/Quest
description: This spell functions similarly to lesser geas, except that it affects a creature of any HD and allows no saving throw.

name: Geas (Lesser)
description: A lesser geas places a magical command on a creature to carry out some service or to refrain from some action or course of activity, as desired by you.

name: Gentle Repose
description: You preserve the remains of a dead creature so that they do not decay.

name: Ghost Sound
description: Ghost sound allows you to create a volume of sound that rises, recedes, approaches, or remains at a fixed place.

name: Ghoul Touch
description: Imbuing you with negative energy, this spell allows you to paralyze a single living humanoid for the duration of the spell with a successful melee touch attack.

name: Giant Form I
description: When you cast this spell you can assume the form of any Large humanoid creature of the giant subtype.

name: Giant Form II
description: This spell functions as giant form I except that it also allows you to assume the form of any Huge creature of the giant type.

name: Giant Vermin
description: You turn a number of normal-sized centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into their giant counterparts.

name: Glibness
description: Your speech becomes fluent and more believable, causing those who hear you to believe every word you say.

name: Glitterdust
description: A cloud of golden particles covers everyone and everything in the area, causing creatures to become blinded and visibly outlining invisible things for the duration of the spell.

name: Globe of Invulnerability
description: This spell functions like lesser globe of invulnerability, except that it also excludes 4th-level spells and spell-like effects.

name: Globe of Invulnerability (Lesser)
description: An immobile, faintly shimmering magical sphere surrounds you and excludes all spell effects of 3rd level or lower.

name: Glyph of Warding
description: This powerful inscription harms those who enter, pass, or open the warded area or object.

name: Glyph of Warding (Greater)
description: This spell functions like glyph of warding, except that a greater blast glyph deals up to 10d8 points of damage, and a greater spell glyph can store a spell of 6th level or lower.

name: Goodberry
description: Casting goodberry makes 2d4 freshly picked berries magical.

name: Good Hope
description: This spell instills powerful hope in the subjects granting a +2 morale bonus on saving throws, attack rolls, ability checks, skill checks, and weapon damage rolls.

name: Grasping Hand
description: This spell functions as interposing hand, except that it can also grapple one opponent you select.

name: Grease
description: A grease spell covers a solid surface with a layer of slippery grease.

name: Guards and Wards
range: Anywhere within the area to be warded
description: This powerful spell is primarily used to defend a stronghold or fortress by creating a number of magical wards and effects.

name: Guidance
description: This spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance.

name: Gust of Wind
description: This spell creates a severe blast of air (approximately 50 mph) that originates from you, affecting all creatures in its path.

name: Hallow
description: Hallow makes a particular site, building, or structure a holy site.

name: Hallucinatory Terrain
description: You make natural terrain look, sound, and smell like some other sort of natural terrain.

name: Harm
description: Harm charges a subject with negative energy that deals (min(150,CASTERLEVEL*10)) points of damage.

name: Haste
description: The transmuted creatures move and act more quickly than normal.

name: Halt Undead
description: This spell renders as many as three undead creatures immobile.

name: Heal
description: Heal enables you to channel positive energy into a creature to wipe away injury and afflictions.

name: Heal (Mass)
description: This spell functions like heal, except as noted above. The maximum number of hit points restored to each creature is (min(250,CASTERLEVEL*10)).

name: Heal Mount
description: This spell functions like heal, but it affects only the paladin's special mount (typically a horse).

name: Heat Metal
description: Heat metal causes metal objects to become red-hot.

name: Helping Hand
description: You create the ghostly image of a hand, which you can send to find a creature within 5 miles.

name: Heroes' Feast
description: You bring forth a great feast, including a magnificent table, chairs, service, and food and drink.

name: Heroism
description: This spell imbues a single creature with great bravery and morale in battle.

name: Heroism (Greater)
description: This spell functions like heroism, except the creature gains a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks, immunity to fear effects, and temporary hit points.

name: Hide from Animals
description: Animals cannot sense the warded creatures.

name: Hide from Undead
description: Undead cannot see, hear, or smell creatures warded by this spell.

name: Hideous Laughter
description: This spell afflicts the subject with uncontrollable laughter.

name: Hold Animal
description: This spell functions like hold person, except that it affects an animal instead of a humanoid.

name: Hold Monster
description: This spell functions like hold person, except that it affects any living creature that fails its Will save.

name: Hold Monster (Mass)
description: This spell functions like hold person, except that it affects multiple creatures and holds any living creature that fails its Will save.

name: Hold Person
description: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place.

name: Hold Person (Mass)
description: This spell functions like hold person, except as noted above.

name: Hold Portal
description: This spell magically holds shut a door, gate, window, or shutter of wood, metal, or stone.

name: Holy Aura
description: A brilliant divine radiance surrounds the subjects, protecting them from attacks, granting them resistance to spells cast by evil creatures, and causing evil creatures to become blinded when they strike the subjects.

name: Holy Smite
description: You draw down holy power to smite your enemies.

name: Holy Sword
description: This spell allows you to channel holy power into your sword, or any other melee weapon you choose.

name: Holy Word
description: Any nongood creature within the area of a holy word spell suffers ill effects.

name: Horrid Wilting
description: This spell evaporates moisture from the body of each subject living creature, causing flesh to wither and crack and crumble to dust dealing (min(20,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of damage.

name: Hypnotic Pattern
description: A twisting pattern of subtle, shifting colors weaves through the air, fascinating creatures within it.

name: Hypnotism
description: Your gestures and droning incantation fascinate nearby creatures, causing them to stop and stare blankly at you.

name: Ice Storm
description: Great magical hailstones pound down upon casting this spell, dealing 3d6 points of bludgeoning damage and 2d6 points of cold damage to every creature in the area.

name: Identify
description: This spell functions as detect magic, except that it gives you a +10 enhancement bonus on Spellcraft checks made to identify the properties and command words of magic items in your possession.

name: Illusory Script
description: You write instructions or other information on parchment, paper, or any suitable writing material. Only the person (or people) designated by you at the time of the casting can read the writing; it's unintelligible to any other character.

name: Illusory Wall
description: This spell creates the illusion of a wall, floor, ceiling, or similar surface.

name: Imbue with Spell Ability
description: You transfer some of your currently prepared spells, and the ability to cast them, to another creature.

name: Implosion
description: This spell causes a destructive resonance in a corporeal creature's body.

name: Imprisonment
description: When you cast imprisonment and touch a creature, it is entombed in a state of suspended animation (see the temporal stasis spell) in a small sphere far beneath the surface of the ground.

name: Incendiary Cloud
description: An incendiary cloud spell creates a cloud of roiling smoke shot through with white-hot embers.

name: Inflict Critical Wounds
description: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 4d8+(min(20,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

name: Inflict Critical Wounds (Mass)
description: Negative energy spreads out in all directions from the point of origin, dealing 4d8+(min(40,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage to nearby living enemies.

name: Inflict Light Wounds
description: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 1d8+(min(5,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

name: Inflict Light Wounds (Mass)
description: Negative energy spreads out in all directions from the point of origin, dealing 1d8+(min(25,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage to nearby living enemies.

name: Inflict Moderate Wounds
description: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 2d8+(min(10,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

name: Inflict Moderate Wounds (Mass)
description: Negative energy spreads out in all directions from the point of origin, dealing 2d8+(min(30,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage to nearby living enemies.

name: Inflict Serious Wounds
description: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 3d8+(min(15,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

name: Inflict Serious Wounds (Mass)
description: Negative energy spreads out in all directions from the point of origin, dealing 3d8+(min(35,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage to nearby living enemies.

name: Insanity
description: The affected creature suffers from a continuous confusion effect, as the spell.

name: Insect Plague
description: You summon a number of swarms of wasps.

name: Instant Summons
description: You call some nonliving item directly to your hand from virtually any location.

name: Interposing Hand
description: Interposing hand creates a Large magic hand that appears between you and one opponent.

name: Invisibility
savingThrow: Will negates (harmless) or Will negates (harmless, object)
description: The creature or object touched becomes invisible.

name: Invisibility (Greater)
description: This spell functions like invisibility, except that it doesn't end if the subject attacks.

name: Invisibility (Mass)
savingThrow: Will negates (harmless) or Will negates (harmless, object)
description: This spell functions like invisibility, except that the effect moves with the group and is broken when anyone in the group attacks.

name: Invisibility Purge
description: You surround yourself with a sphere of power with a radius of (CASTERLEVEL*5) feet that negates all forms of invisibility.

name: Invisibility Sphere
savingThrow: Will negates (harmless) or Will negates (harmless, object)
description: This spell functions like invisibility, except that this spell confers invisibility upon all creatures within 10 feet of the recipient at the time the spell is cast. The center of the effect is mobile with the recipient.

name: Iron Body
description: This spell transforms your body into living iron, which grants you several powerful resistances and abilities.

name: Ironwood
description: Using this spell with wood shape or a wood-related Craft check, you can fashion wooden items that function as steel items.

name: Irresistible Dance
description: The subject feels an undeniable urge to dance and begins doing so, complete with foot shuffling and tapping.

name: Jump
description: The subject gets a +10 enhancement bonus on Acrobatics checks made to attempt high jumps or long jumps.

name: Keen Edge
description: This spell makes a weapon magically keen, improving its ability to deal telling blows.

name: Knock
description: Knock opens stuck, barred, or locked doors, as well as those subject to hold portal or arcane lock.

name: Know Direction
description: When you cast this spell, you instantly know the direction of north from your current position.

name: Legend Lore
description: Legend lore brings to your mind legends about an important person, place, or thing.

name: Levitate
description: Levitate allows you to move yourself, another creature, or an object up and down as you wish.

name: Light
description: This spell causes a touched object to glow like a torch.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: You release a powerful stroke of electrical energy that deals (min(10,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of electricity damage to each creature within its area.

name: Limited Wish
description: A limited wish lets you create nearly any type of effect.

name: Liveoak
description: This spell turns an oak tree into a protector or guardian.

name: Locate Creature
description: This spell functions like locate object, except this spell locates a known creature.

name: Locate Object
description: You sense the direction of a well-known or clearly visualized object.

name: Longstrider
description: This spell gives you a +10 foot enhancement bonus to your base speed.

name: Lullaby
description: Any creature within the area that fails a Will save becomes drowsy and inattentive, taking a -5 penalty on Perception checks and a -2 penalty on Will saves against sleep effects while the lullaby is in effect.

name: Mage Armor
description: An invisible but tangible field of force surrounds the subject of a mage armor spell, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC.

name: Mage Hand
description: You point your finger at an object and can lift it and move it at will from a distance.

name: Mage's Disjunction
description: All magical effects and magic items within the radius of the spell, except for those that you carry or touch, are disjoined.

name: Mage's Faithful Hound
duration: CL hours or until discharged, then CL rounds; see text
description: You conjure up a phantom watchdog that is invisible to everyone but yourself.

name: Mage's Lucubration
description: You instantly prepare any one spell of 5th level or lower that you have used during the past 24 hours.

name: Mage's Magnificent Mansion
description: You conjure up an extradimensional dwelling that has a single entrance on the plane from which the spell was cast.

name: Mage's Private Sanctum
description: This spell ensures privacy. Anyone looking into the area from outside sees only a dark, foggy mass. Darkvision cannot penetrate it.

name: Mage's Sword
description: This spell brings into being a shimmering, sword-like plane of force.

name: Magic Aura
description: You alter an item's aura so that it registers to detect spells as though it were nonmagical, or a magic item of a kind you specify, or the subject of a spell you specify.

name: Magic Circle against Chaos
description: All creatures within the area gain the effects of a protection from chaos spell, and chaotic summoned creatures cannot enter the area either.

name: Magic Circle against Evil
description: All creatures within the area gain the effects of a protection from evil spell, and evil summoned creatures cannot enter the area either.

name: Magic Circle against Good
description: All creatures within the area gain the effects of a protection from good spell, and good summoned creatures cannot enter the area either.

name: Magic Circle against Law
description: All creatures within the area gain the effects of a protection from law spell, and lawfull summoned creatures cannot enter the area either.

name: Magic Fang
description: Magic fang gives one natural weapon or unarmed strike of the subject a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

name: Magic Fang (Greater)
description: This spell functions like magic fang, except that the enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls is +(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/4))).

name: Magic Jar
duration: CL hours or until you return to your body
description: By casting magic jar, you place your soul in a gem or large crystal (known as the magic jar), leaving your body lifeless.

name: Magic Missile
description: (min((CASTERLEVEL+1)/2,5)) missiles that do 1d4+1 damage each.

name: Magic Mouth
description: This spell imbues the chosen object or creature with an enchanted mouth that suddenly appears and speaks its message the next time a specified event occurs.

name: Magic Stone
description: You transmute as many as three pebbles, which can be no larger than sling bullets, so that they strike with great force when thrown or slung.

name: Magic Vestment
description: You imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an enhancement bonus of +(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/4))).

name: Magic Weapon
description: Magic weapon gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

name: Magic Weapon (Greater)
description: This spell functions like magic weapon, except that it gives a weapon an enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls of +(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/4))).

name: Major Creation
description: This spell functions like minor creation, except that you can also create an object of mineral nature: stone, crystal, metal, or the like.

name: Major Image
description: This spell functions like silent image, except that sound, smell, and thermal illusions are included in the spell effect.

name: Make Whole
description: This spell functions as mending, except that it repairs (min(5,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of damage when cast on a construct creature.

name: Mark of Justice
description: You mark a subject and state some behavior on the part of the subject that will activate the mark.

name: Maze
description: You banish the subject into an extradimensional labyrinth.

name: Meld into Stone
description: Meld into stone enables you to meld your body and possessions into a single block of stone.

name: Mending
description: This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.

name: Message
description: You can whisper messages and receive whispered replies.

name: Meteor Swarm
savingThrow: None or Reflex half, see text
description: Meteor swarm is a very powerful and spectacular spell that is similar to fireball in many aspects.

name: Mind Blank
description: The subject is protected from all devices and spells that gather information about the target through divination magic.

name: Mind Fog
description: Mind fog produces a bank of thin mist that weakens the mental resistance of those caught in it.

name: Minor Creation
description: You create a nonmagical, unattended object of nonliving vegetable matter.

name: Minor Image
description: This spell functions like silent image, except that minor image includes some minor sounds but not understandable speech.

name: Miracle
description: You don't so much cast a miracle as request one.

name: Mirage Arcana
description: This spell functions like hallucinatory terrain, except that it enables you to make any area appear to be something other than it is.

name: Mirror Image
description: This spell creates a number of illusory doubles of you that inhabit your square.

name: Misdirection
savingThrow: None or Will negates; see text
description: By means of this spell, you misdirect the information from divination spells that reveal auras (detect evil, detect magic, discern lies, and the like).

name: Mislead
duration: CL rounds [D] and concentration + 3 rounds; see text
savingThrow: None or Will disbelief (if interacted with); see text;
description: You become invisible (as greater invisibility, a glamer), and at the same time, an illusory double of you (as major image, a figment) appears.

name: Mnemonic Enhancer
description: Casting this spell allows you to prepare additional spells or retain spells recently cast.

name: Modify Memory
description: You reach into the subject's mind and modify as many as 5 minutes of its memories in one of the following ways.

name: Moment of Prescience
description: This spell grants you a sixth sense.

name: Mount
description: You summon a light horse or a pony (your choice) to serve you as a mount.

name: Move Earth
description: Move earth moves dirt (clay, loam, sand, and soil), possibly collapsing embankments, moving hillocks, shifting dunes, and so forth.

name: Neutralize Poison
duration: Instantaneous or CL minutes; see text
description: You detoxify any sort of venom in the creature or object touched.

name: Nightmare
description: You send a hideous and unsettling phantasmal vision to a specific creature that you name or otherwise specifically designate.

name: Nondetection
description: The warded creature or object becomes difficult to detect by divination spells such as clairaudience/clairvoyance, locate object, and detect spells.

name: Obscure Object
description: This spell hides an object from location by divination [scrying] effects, such as the scrying spell or a crystal ball.

name: Obscuring Mist
description: A misty, stationary vapor arises around you obscuring all sight, including darkvision, beyond 5 feet.

name: Open/Close
description: You can open or close (your choice) a door, chest, box, window, bag, pouch, bottle, barrel, or other container.

name: Order's Wrath
description: You channel lawful power to smite enemies.

name: Overland Flight
description: This spell functions like a fly spell, except you can fly at a speed of 40 feet (30 feet if wearing medium or heavy armor, or if carrying a medium or heavy load).

name: Owl's Wisdom
description: The transmuted creature becomes wiser gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

name: Owl's Wisdom (Mass)
description: This spell functions like owl's wisdom, except that it affects multiple creatures.

name: Passwall
description: You create a passage through wooden, plaster, or stone walls, but not through metal or other harder materials.

name: Pass without Trace
description: The subject or subjects of this spell do not leave footprints or a scent trail while moving.

name: Permanency
description: This spell makes the duration of certain other spells permanent.

name: Permanent Image
description: This spell functions like silent image, except that the figment includes visual, auditory, olfactory, and thermal elements, and the spell is permanent.

name: Persistent Image
description: This spell functions like silent image, except that the figment includes visual, auditory, olfactory, and thermal components, and the figment follows a script determined by you.

name: Phantasmal Killer
savingThrow: Will disbelief, then Fortitude partial; see text
description: You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast.

name: Phantom Steed
description: You conjure a Large, quasi-real, horselike creature.

name: Phantom Trap
description: This spell makes a lock or other small mechanism seem to be trapped to anyone who can detect traps.

name: Phase Door
description: This spell creates an ethereal passage through wooden, plaster, or stone walls, but not other materials.

name: Planar Ally
description: This spell functions like lesser planar ally, except you may call a single creature of 12 HD or less, or two creatures of the same kind whose HD total no more than 12.

name: Planar Ally (Greater)
description: This spell functions like lesser planar ally, except that you may call a single creature of 18 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 18.

name: Planar Ally (Lesser)
description: By casting this spell, you request your deity to send you an outsider (of 6 HD or less) of the deity's choice.

name: Planar Binding
description: This spell functions like lesser planar binding, except that you may call a single creature of 12 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 12.

name: Planar Binding (Greater)
description: This spell functions like lesser planar binding, except that you may call a single creature of 18 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 18.

name: Planar Binding (Lesser)
description: Casting this spell attempts a dangerous act: to lure a creature from another plane to a specifically prepared trap, which must lie within the spell's range.

name: Plane Shift
description: You move yourself or some other creature to another plane of existence or alternate dimension.

name: Plant Growth
description: Plant growth has different effects depending on the version chosen.

name: Plant Shape I
description: When you cast this spell you can assume the form of any Small or Medium creature of the plant type.

name: Plant Shape II
description: This spell functions as plant shape I except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Large creature of the plant type.

name: Plant Shape III
description: This spell functions as plant shape II except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Huge creature of the plant type.

name: Poison
description: Calling upon the venomous powers of natural predators, you infect the subject with a horrible poison by making a successful melee touch attack.

name: Polar Ray
description: A blue-white ray of freezing air and ice springs from your hand.

name: Polymorph
description: This spell transforms a willing creature into an animal, humanoid or elemental of your choosing.

name: Polymorph (Greater)
description: This spell functions as polymorph except that it allows the creature to take on the form of a dragon or plant creature.

name: Polymorph Any Object
description: This spell functions like greater polymorph, except that it changes one object or creature into another.

name: Power Word Blind
description: You utter a single word of power that causes a creature to become blinded, whether the creature can hear the word or not.

name: Power Word Kill
description: You utter a single word of power that instantly kills one creature of your choice, whether the creature can hear the word or not.

name: Power Word Stun
description: You utter a single word of power that instantly causes one creature of your choice to become stunned, whether the creature can hear the word or not.

name: Prayer
description: You bring special favor upon yourself and your allies while bringing disfavor to your enemies.

name: Prestidigitation
description: Prestidigitations are minor tricks that novice spellcasters use for practice.

name: Prismatic Sphere
description: This spell functions like prismatic wall, except you conjure up an immobile, opaque globe of shimmering, multicolored light that surrounds you and protects you from all forms of attack.

name: Prismatic Spray
description: This spell causes seven shimmering, multicolored beams of light to spray from your hand.

name: Prismatic Wall
description: Prismatic wall creates a vertical, opaque wall--a shimmering, multicolored plane of light that protects you from all forms of attack.

name: Prying Eyes
description: You create a number of semitangible, visible magical orbs (called "eyes") equal to 1d4+(CASTERLEVEL). These eyes move out, scout around, and return as you direct them when casting the spell.

name: Prying Eyes (Greater)
description: This spell functions like prying eyes, except that the eyes can see all things as they actually are, just as if they had true seeing with a range of 120 feet.

name: Produce Flame
description: Flames as bright as a torch appear in your open hand.

name: Programmed Image
duration: Permanent until triggered, then CL rounds
description: This spell functions like silent image, except that this spell's figment activates when a specific condition occurs.

name: Project Image
description: You tap energy from the Plane of Shadow to create a quasi-real, illusory version of yourself.

name: Protection from Arrows
description: The warded creature gains resistance to ranged weapons.

name: Protection from Chaos
description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by chaotic creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

name: Protection from Energy
description: Protection from energy grants temporary immunity to the type of energy you specify when you cast it.

name: Protection from Evil
description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

name: Protection from Good
description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by good creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

name: Protection from Law
description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by lawful creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

name: Protection from Spells
description: The subject gains a +8 resistance bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities.

name: Purify Food and Drink
description: This spell makes spoiled, rotten, diseased, poisonous, or otherwise contaminated food and water pure and suitable for eating and drinking.

name: Pyrotechnics
duration: 1d4+1 rounds, or 1d4+1 rounds after creatures leave the smoke cloud; see text
savingThrow: Will negates or Fortitude negates; see text; Spell
description: Pyrotechnics turns a fire into a burst of blinding fireworks or a thick cloud of choking smoke, depending on your choice.

name: Quench
description: Quench is often used to put out forest fires and other conflagrations.

name: Rage
description: Each affected creature gains a +2 morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +1 morale bonus on Will saves, and a -2 penalty to AC.

name: Rainbow Pattern
description: A glowing, rainbow-hued pattern of interweaving colors fascinates those within it.

name: Raise Dead
description: You restore life to a deceased creature.

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
description: A coruscating ray springs from your hand, the subject takes a penalty to Strength equal to 1d6+(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/2))).

name: Ray of Exhaustion
description: A black ray projects from your pointing finger. The subject is immediately exhausted for the spell's duration.

name: Ray of Frost
description: A ray of freezing air and ice projects from your pointing finger dealing 1d3 points of cold damage.

name: Read Magic
description: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.

name: Reduce Animal
description: This spell functions like reduce person, except that it affects a single willing animal.

name: Reduce Person
description: This spell causes instant diminution of a humanoid creature, halving its height, length, and width and dividing its weight by 8.

name: Reduce Person (Mass)
description: This spell functions like reduce person, except that it affects multiple creatures.

name: Refuge
description: When you cast this spell, you create powerful magic in a specially prepared object.

name: Regenerate
description: The subject's severed body members (fingers, toes, hands, feet, arms, legs, tails, or even heads of multiheaded creatures), broken bones, and ruined organs grow back

name: Reincarnate
description: With this spell, you bring back a dead creature in another body.

name: Remove Blindness/Deafness
description: Remove blindness/deafness cures blindness or deafness.

name: Remove Curse
description: Remove curse can remove all curses on an object or a creature.

name: Remove Disease
description: Remove disease can cure all diseases from which the subject is suffering.

name: Remove Fear
description: You instill courage in the subject, granting it a +4 morale bonus against fear effects for 10 minutes.

name: Remove Paralysis
description: You can free one or more creatures from the effects of temporary paralysis or related magic.

name: Repel Metal or Stone
description: This spell creates waves of invisible energy that roll forth from you pushing all metal or stone objects in the path of the spell away from you to the limit of the range.

name: Repel Vermin
savingThrow: None or Will negates; see text
description: An invisible barrier holds back vermin.

name: Repel Wood
description: Waves of energy roll forth from you, moving in the direction that you determine, causing all wooden objects in the path of the spell to be pushed away from you to the limit of the range.

name: Repulsion
description: An invisible, mobile field surrounds you and prevents creatures from approaching you.

name: Resilient Sphere
description: A globe of shimmering force encloses a creature, provided the creature is small enough to fit within the diameter of the sphere.

name: Resistance
description: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.

name: Resist Energy
description: This abjuration grants a creature limited protection from damage of whichever one of five energy types you select.

name: Restoration
description: This spell functions like lesser restoration, except that it also dispels temporary negative levels or one permanent negative level.

name: Restoration (Greater)
description: This spell functions like lesser restoration, except that it dispels all permanent and temporary negative levels afflicting the healed creature.

name: Restoration (Lesser)
description: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.

name: Resurrection
description: This spell functions like raise dead, except that you are able to restore life and complete strength to any deceased creature.

name: Reverse Gravity
description: This spell reverses gravity in an area, causing unattached objects and creatures in the area to fall upward and reach the top of the area in 1 round.

name: Righteous Might
description: Your height immediately doubles, and your weight increases by a factor of eight.

name: Rope Trick
description: When this spell is cast upon a piece of rope from 5 to 30 feet ,long, one end of the rope rises into the air until the whole rope hangs perpendicular to the ground, as if affixed at the upper end.

name: Rusting Grasp
description: Any iron or iron alloy item you touch crumbles into rust.

name: Sanctuary
description: Any opponent attempting to directly attack the warded creature, even with a targeted spell, must attempt a Will save.

name: Scare
duration: CL rounds or 1 round; see text for cause fear
description: This spell functions like cause fear, except that it causes all targeted creatures of less than 6 HD to become frightened.

name: Scintillating Pattern
description: A twisting pattern of coruscating colors weaves through the air, affecting creatures within.

name: Scorching Ray
description: You blast your enemies with up to (min(3,1+(floor((CASTERLEVEL-3)/4)))) searing beams of fire dealing 4d6 points of fire damage.

name: Screen
savingThrow: None or Will disbelief (if interacted with); see text;
description: This spell creates a powerful protection from scrying and observation.

name: Scrying
description: You can observe a creature at any distance.

name: Scrying (Greater)
description: This spell functions like scrying, except as noted above.

name: Sculpt Sound
description: You can change the sounds that creatures or objects make.

name: Searing Light
description: Focusing divine power like a ray of the sun, you project a blast of light from your open palm dealing (min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/2)))d8 points of damage.

name: Secret Chest
description: You hide a chest on the Ethereal Plane for as long as 60 days and can retrieve it at will.

name: Secret Page
description: Secret page alters the contents of a page so that it appears to be something entirely different.

name: Secure Shelter
description: You conjure a sturdy cottage or lodge made of material that is common in the area where the spell is cast.

name: See Invisibility
description: You can see any objects or beings that are invisible within your range of vision, as well as any that are ethereal, as if they were normally visible.

name: Seeming
savingThrow: Will negates or Will disbelief (if interacted with);
description: This spell functions like disguise self, except that you can change the appearance of other people as well.

name: Sending
description: You contact a particular creature with which you are familiar and send a short message of 25 words or less to the subject.

name: Sepia Snake Sigil
duration: Permanent or until discharged; until released or 1d4+CL days; see text
description: You cause a small symbol to appear in the text of a written work.

name: Sequester
description: When cast, this spell prevents divination spells from detecting or locating the target and also renders the affected target invisible (as the invisibility spell).

name: Shades
savingThrow: Will disbelief (if interacted with); varies; see text;
description: This spell functions like shadow conjuration, except that it mimics conjuration spells of 8th level or lower.

name: Shadow Conjuration
savingThrow: Will disbelief (if interacted with); varies; see text;
description: You use material from the Plane of Shadow to shape quasi-real illusions of one or more creatures, objects, or forces.

name: Shadow Conjuration (Greater)
savingThrow: Will disbelief (if interacted with); varies; see text;
description: This spell functions like shadow conjuration, except that it duplicates any sorcerer or wizard conjuration [summoning] or conjuration (creation) spell of 6th level or lower.

name: Shadow Evocation
description: You tap energy from the Plane of Shadow to cast a quasi-real, illusory version of a sorcerer or wizard evocation spell of 4th level or lower.

name: Shadow Evocation (Greater)
description: This spell functions like shadow evocation, except that it enables you to create partially real, illusory versions of sorcerer or wizard evocation spells of 7th level or lower.

name: Shadow Walk
description: You and any creature you touch are transported along a coiling path of shadowstuff to the edge of the Material Plane where it borders the Plane of Shadow.

name: Shambler
description: The shambler spell creates 1d4+2 shambling mounds with the advanced template.

name: Shapechange
description: This spell allows you to take the form of a wide variety of creatures.

name: Shatter
savingThrow: Will negates (object); Will negates (object) or Fortitude half; see text
description: Shatter creates a loud, ringing noise that breaks brittle, nonmagical objects; sunders a single solid, nonmagical object; or damages a crystalline creature.

name: Shield
description: Shield creates an invisible shield of force that hovers in front of you.

name: Shield of Faith
description: This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the target that averts and deflects attacks.

name: Shield of Law
description: A dim, blue glow surrounds the subjects, protecting them from attacks, granting them resistance to spells cast by chaotic creatures, and slowing chaotic creatures when they strike the subjects.

name: Shield Other
description: This spell wards the subject and creates a mystic connection between you and the subject so that some of its wounds are transferred to you.

name: Shillelagh
description: Your own nonmagical club or quarterstaff becomes a weapon with a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

name: Shrink Item
description: You are able to shrink one nonmagical item to 1/16 of its normal size in each dimension.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Your successful melee touch attack deals (min(5,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of electricity damage.

name: Shout
savingThrow: Fortitude partial or Reflex negates (object); see text;
description: You emit an ear-splitting yell that deafens and damages creatures in its path.

name: Shout (Greater)
savingThrow: Fortitude partial or Reflex negates (object); see text
description: This spell functions like shout, except that the cone deals 10d6 points of sonic damage.

name: Silence
savingThrow: Will negates; see text or none (object)
description: Upon the casting of this spell, complete silence prevails in the affected area.

name: Silent Image
description: This spell creates the visual illusion of an object, creature, or force, as visualized by you.

name: Simulacrum
description: Simulacrum creates an illusory duplicate of any creature.

name: Slay Living
description: You can attempt to slay any one living creature.

name: Sleep
description: A sleep spell causes a magical slumber to come upon 4 HD of creatures.

name: Sleet Storm
description: Driving sleet blocks all sight (even darkvision) within it and causes the ground in the area to be icy.

name: Slow
description: An affected creature moves and attacks at a drastically slowed rate.

name: Snare
description: This spell enables you to make a snare that functions as a magic trap.

name: Soften Earth and Stone
description: When this spell is cast, all natural, undressed earth or stone in the spell's area is softened.

name: Solid Fog
description: This spell functions like fog cloud, but in addition to obscuring sight, the solid fog is so thick that it impedes movement.

name: Song of Discord
description: This spell causes those within the area to turn on each other rather than attack their foes.

name: Soul Bind
description: You draw the soul from a newly dead body and imprison it in a black sapphire gem.

name: Sound Burst
description: You blast an area with a tremendous cacophony.

name: Speak with Animals
description: You can ask questions of and receive answers from animals, but the spell doesn't make them any more friendly than normal.

name: Speak with Dead
description: You grant the semblance of life to a corpse, allowing it to answer questions.

name: Speak with Plants
description: You can communicate with normal plants and plant creatures, and can ask questions of and receive answers from them.

name: Spectral Hand
description: A ghostly hand shaped from your life force materializes and moves as you desire, allowing you to deliver low-level, touch range spells at a distance.

name: Spell Immunity
description: The warded creature is immune to the effects of one specified spell for every four levels you have.

name: Spell Immunity (Greater)
description: This spell functions like spell immunity, except the immunity applies to spells of 8th level or lower.

name: Spell Resistance
description: The target gains spell resistance equal to (12+CASTERLEVEL).

name: Spellstaff
description: You store one spell that you can normally cast in a wooden quarterstaff.

name: Spell Turning
description: Spells and spell-like effects targeted on you are turned back upon the original caster.

name: Spider Climb
description: The subject can climb and travel on vertical surfaces or even traverse ceilings as well as a spider does.

name: Spike Growth
description: Any ground-covering vegetation in the spell's area becomes very hard and sharply pointed without changing its appearance.

name: Spike Stones
description: Rocky ground, stone floors, and similar surfaces shape themselves into long, sharp points that blend into the background.

name: Spiritual Weapon
description: A weapon made of force appears and attacks foes at a distance, as you direct it, dealing 1d8+(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/3))) force damage per hit.

name: Stabilize
description: Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has -1 or fewer hit points.

name: Statue
description: A statue spell turns the subject to solid stone, along with any garments and equipment worn or carried.

name: Status
description: When you need to keep track of comrades who may get separated, status allows you to mentally monitor their relative positions and general condition.

name: Stinking Cloud
description: Stinking cloud creates a bank of fog like that created by fog cloud, except that the vapors are nauseating.

name: Stone Shape
description: You can form an existing piece of stone into any shape that suits your purpose.

name: Stoneskin
description: The warded creature gains resistance to blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes.

name: Stone Tell
description: You gain the ability to speak with stones, which relate to you who or what has touched them as well as revealing what is covered or concealed behind or under them.

name: Stone to Flesh
description: This spell restores a petrified creature to its normal state, restoring life and goods.

name: Storm of Vengeance
description: You create a huge black storm cloud in the air.

name: Suggestion
description: You influence the actions of the target creature by suggesting a course of activity.

name: Suggestion (Mass)
description: This spell functions like suggestion, except that it can affect more creatures.

name: Summon Instrument
description: This spell summons one handheld musical instrument of your choice.

name: Summon Monster I
description: This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

name: Summon Monster II
description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 2nd-level list or 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.

name: Summon Monster III
description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can  summon one creature from the 3rd-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 2nd-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.

name: Summon Monster IV
description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 4th-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 3rd-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.

name: Summon Monster V
description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 5th-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 4th-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.

name: Summon Monster VI
description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except you can summon one creature from the 6th-level list, 1d3 creatures of thesame kind from the 5th-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.

name: Summon Monster VII
description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 7th-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 6th-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.

name: Summon Monster VIII
description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 8th-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 7th-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.

name: Summon Monster IX
