description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 9th-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 8th-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.

name: Summon Nature's Ally I
description: This spell summons to your side a natural creature (typically an animal, fey, magical beast, outsider with the elemental subtype, or a giant).

name: Summon Nature's Ally II
description: This spell functions as summon nature's ally I, except that you summon one 2nd-level creature or 1d3 1st-level creatures of the same kind.

name: Summon Nature's Ally III
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 3rd-level creature, 1d3 2nd-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 1st-level creatures of the same kind.

name: Summon Nature's Ally IV
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 4th-level creature, 1d3 3rd-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind.

name: Summon Nature's Ally V
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 5th-level creature, 1d3 4th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind.

name: Summon Nature's Ally VI
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 6th-level creature, 1d3 5th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind.

name: Summon Nature's Ally VII
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 7th-level creature, 1d3 6th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind.

name: Summon Nature's Ally VIII
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 8th-level creature, 1d3 7th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind.

name: Summon Nature's Ally IX
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 9th-level creature, 1d3 8th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind.

name: Summon Swarm
description: You summon a swarm of bats, rats, or spiders (your choice), which attacks all other creatures within its area.

name: Sunbeam
duration: CL rounds or until all beams are exhausted
savingThrow: Reflex negates and Reflex half; see text; Spell
description: For the duration of this spell, you can use a standard action to evoke a dazzling beam of intense light each round.

name: Sunburst
description: Sunburst causes a globe of searing radiance to explode silently from a point you select.

name: Symbol of Death
description: This spell allows you to scribe a potent rune of power upon a surface. When triggered, a symbol of death kills one or more creatures within 60 feet of the symbol.

name: Symbol of Fear
description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures within 60 feet of the symbol of fear instead become panicked for 1 round per caster level.

name: Symbol of Insanity
description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures within the radius of the symbol of insanity instead become permanently insane.

name: Symbol of Pain
description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that each creature within the radius of a symbol of pain instead suffers wracking pains that impose a -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks, and ability checks.

name: Symbol of Persuasion
description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures within the radius of a symbol of persuasion instead become charmed by the caster for 1 hour per caster level.

name: Symbol of Sleep
description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures of 10 HD or less within 60 feet of the symbol of sleep instead fall into a catatonic slumber for 3d6 *o 10 minutes.

name: Symbol of Stunning
description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures within 60 feet of a symbol of stunning instead become stunned for 1d6 rounds.

name: Symbol of Weakness
description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that every creature within 60 feet of a symbol of weakness instead suffers crippling weakness that deals 3d6 points of Strength damage.

name: Sympathetic Vibration
description: By attuning yourself to a freestanding structure, you can create a damaging vibration within it.

name: Sympathy
description: You cause an object or location to emanate magical vibrations that attract either a specific kind of intelligent creature or creatures of a particular alignment, as defined by you.

name: Telekinesis
duration: Concentration (up to CL rounds) or instantaneous; see text
savingThrow: Will negates (object) or none; see text; Spell
description: You move objects or creatures by concentrating on them.

name: Telekinetic Sphere
description: This spell functions like resilient sphere, but the creatures or objects caught inside the globe created by the spell are made nearly weightless.

name: Telepathic Bond
description: You forge a telepathic bond among yourself and a number of willing creatures, each of which must have an Intelligence score of 3 or higher.

name: Teleport
description: This spell instantly transports you to a designated destination, which may be as distant as 100 miles per caster level.

name: Teleport (Greater)
description: This spell functions like teleport, except that there is no range limit and there is no chance you arrive off target.

name: Teleport Object
description: This spell functions like teleport, except that it teleports an object, not you.

name: Teleportation Circle
description: You create a circle on the floor or other horizontal surface that teleports, as greater teleport, any creature who stands on it to a designated spot.

name: Temporal Stasis
description: You place the subject into a state of suspended animation.

name: Time Stop
description: This spell seems to make time cease to flow for everyone but you.

name: Tiny Hut
description: You create an unmoving, opaque sphere of force of any color you desire around yourself.

name: Tongues
description: This spell grants the creature touched the ability to speak and understand the language of any intelligent creature, whether it is a racial tongue or a regional dialect.

name: Touch of Fatigue
description: You channel negative energy through your touch, fatiguing the target.

name: Touch of Idiocy
description: With a touch, you reduce the target's mental faculties.

name: Transformation
description: You become a fighting machine--stronger, tougher, faster, and more skilled in combat.

name: Transmute Metal to Wood
description: This spell enables you to change all metal objects within its area to wood.

name: Transmute Mud to Rock
description: This spell permanently transforms normal mud or quicksand of any depth into soft stone.

name: Transmute Rock to Mud
description: This spell turns natural, uncut, or unworked rock of any sort into an equal volume of mud.

name: Transport via Plants
description: You can enter any normal plant (equal to your size or larger) and pass any distance to a plant of the same kind in a single round, regardless of the distance separating the two.

name: Trap the Soul
description: Trap the soul forces a creature's life force (and its material body) into a gem.

name: Tree Shape
description: This spell allows you to assume the form of a Large living tree or shrub or a Large dead tree trunk with a small number of limbs.

name: Tree Stride
duration: CL hours or until expended; see text
description: When you cast this spell, you gain the ability to step into a tree, magically infusing yourself with the plant.

name: True Resurrection
description: This spell functions like raise dead, except that you can resurrect a creature that has been dead for as long as (CASTERLEVEL*10) years.

name: True Seeing
description: You confer on the subject the ability to see all things as they actually are.

name: True Strike
description: You gain temporary, intuitive insight into the immediate future during your next attack.

name: Undeath to Death
description: This spell functions like circle of death, except that it destroys undead creatures as noted above.

name: Undetectable Alignment
description: An undetectable alignment spell conceals the alignment of an object or a creature from all forms of divination.

name: Unhallow
description: Unhallow makes a particular site, building, or structure an unholy site.

name: Unholy Aura
description: A malevolent darkness surrounds the subjects, protecting them from attacks, granting them resistance to spells cast by good creatures, and weakening good creatures when they strike the subjects.

name: Unholy Blight
description: You call up unholy power to smite your enemies.

name: Unseen Servant
description: An unseen servant is an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command.

name: Vampiric Touch
description: Your touch deals (min(10,floor(CASTERLEVEL/2)))d6 points of damage.

name: Veil
description: You instantly change the appearance of the subjects and then maintain that appearance for the spell's duration.

name: Ventriloquism
description: You can make your voice seem to issue from someplace else.

name: Virtue
description: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.

name: Vision
description: This spell functions like legend lore, except that it works more quickly and produces some strain on you.

name: Wail of the Banshee
description: When you cast this spell, you emit a terrible, soul-chilling scream that possibly kills creatures that hear it.

name: Wall of Fire
description: An immobile, blazing curtain of shimmering violet fire springs into existence.

name: Wall of Force
description: A wall of force creates an invisible wall of pure force.

name: Wall of Ice
description: This spell creates an anchored plane of ice or a hemisphere of ice, depending on the version selected.

name: Wall of Iron
description: You cause a flat, vertical iron wall to spring into being.

name: Wall of Stone
description: This spell creates a wall of rock that merges into adjoining rock surfaces.

name: Wall of Thorns
description: A wall of thorns spell creates a barrier of very tough, pliable, tangled brush bearing needle-sharp thorns as long as a human's finger.

name: Warp Wood
description: You cause wood to bend and warp, permanently destroying its straightness, form, and strength.

name: Water Breathing
description: The transmuted creatures can breathe water freely.

name: Water Walk
description: The transmuted creatures can tread on any liquid as if it were firm ground.

name: Waves of Exhaustion
description: Waves of negative energy cause all living creatures in the spell's target to become exhausted.

name: Waves of Fatigue
description: Waves of negative energy render all living creatures in the spell's area fatigued.

name: Web
description: Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them.

name: Weird
savingThrow: Will disbelief, then Fortitude partial; see text
description: This spell functions like phantasmal killer, except it can affect more than one creature.

name: Whirlwind
description: This spell creates a powerful cyclone of raging wind that moves through the air, along the ground, or over water at a speed of 60 feet per round.

name: Whispering Wind
duration: No more than CL hours or until discharged
description: You send a message or sound on the wind to a designated spot.

name: Wind Walk
description: You alter the substance of your body to a cloudlike vapor and move through the air, possibly at great speed.

name: Wind Wall
description: An invisible vertical curtain of wind appears.

name: Wish
description: Wish is the mightiest spell a wizard or sorcerer can cast. By simply speaking aloud, you can alter reality to better suit you.

name: Wood Shape
description: Wood shape enables you to form one existing piece of wood into any shape that suits your purpose.

name: Word of Recall
savingThrow: None or Will negates (harmless, object); Spell
description: Word of recall teleports you instantly back to your sanctuary when the word is uttered.

name: Word of Chaos
savingThrow: None or Will negates; see text
description: Any nonchaotic creature within the area of a word of chaos spell suffers ill effects.

name: Zone of Silence
description: By casting zone of silence, you manipulate sound waves in your immediate vicinity so that you and those within the spell's area can converse normally, yet no one outside can hear your voices or any other noises from within.

name: Zone of Truth
description: Creatures within the emanation area (or those who enter it) can't speak any deliberate and intentional lies.

name: Magic Vestment (Shield use)
description: You imbue a shield with an enhancement bonus of +(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/4))).

name: Align Weapon (Chaos Only)
description: Weapon becomes chaotic.

name: Align Weapon (Evil Only)
description: Weapon becomes evil.

name: Align Weapon (Good Only)
description: Weapon becomes good.

name: Align Weapon (Law Only)
description: Weapon becomes lawful.

name: Beast Shape III (Animals Only)
description: This spell functions as beast shape II, except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Diminutive or Huge creature of the animal type.

name: Blindness/Deafness (Blindness Only)
description: Makes subject blinded.

name: Elemental Body IV (Air Only)
description: Turns you into a Huge elemental.

name: Elemental Body IV (Earth Only)
description: Turns you into a Huge elemental.

name: Elemental Body IV (Fire Only)
description: Turns you into a Huge elemental.

name: Elemental Body IV (Water Only)
description: Turns you into a Huge elemental.

name: Elemental Swarm (Air Spell Only)
description: Summons multiple air elementals.

name: Elemental Swarm (Earth Spell Only)
description: Summons multiple earth elementals.

name: Elemental Swarm (Fire Spell Only)
description: Summons multiple fire elementals.

name: Elemental Swarm (Water Spell Only)
description: Summons multiple water elementals.

name: Summon Nature's Ally IV (Animals Only)
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 4th-level animal, 1d3 3rd-level animals of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level animals of the same kind.

name: Summon Nature's Ally VIII (Animals Only)
description: This spell functions like summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 8th-level animal, 1d3 7th-level animals of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level animals of the same kind.

name: Summon Monster V (1d3 Shadows)
description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can only summon 1d3 shadows.

name: Summon Monster IX (Chaos Spell Only)
description: Calls chaotic extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Summon Monster IX (Evil Spell Only)
description: Calls evil extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Summon Monster IX (Good Spell Only)
description: Calls good extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Summon Monster IX (Law Spell Only)
description: Calls lawful extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Burning Hands (Acid)
description: (min(CASTERLEVEL,5))d4 acid damage

name: Burning Hands (Cold)
description: (min(CASTERLEVEL,5))d4 cold damage

name: Burning Hands (Electricity)
description: (min(CASTERLEVEL,5))d4 electricity damage

name: Planar Binding (Devils and Fiendish Creatures Only)
description: This spell functions like lesser planar binding, except that you may call a single creature of 12 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 12.

name: Scorching Ray (Acid)
description: (1+min((CASTERLEVEL-3)/4,2)) rays, ranged touch attack deals 4d6 acid damage.

name: Scorching Ray (Cold)
description: (1+min((CASTERLEVEL-3)/4,2)) rays, ranged touch attack deals 4d6 cold damage.

name: Scorching Ray (Electricity)
description: (1+min((CASTERLEVEL-3)/4,2)) rays, ranged touch attack deals 4d6 electricity damage.

name: Summon Monster VIII (Elementals Only)
description: Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Plane Shift.COPY=Plane Shift (self only/to Shadow or Material Plane)
Plane Shift.COPY=Plane Shift (to Shadow or Material Plane)
Speak with Animals.COPY=Speak with Animals (aquatic animals only)
Speak with Animals.COPY=Speak with Animals (birds or other flying animals only)
Speak with Animals.COPY=Speak with Animals (pigs and boars only)
Speak with Animals.COPY=Speak with Animals (rodents only)
Summon Monster III.COPY=Summon Monster III (lantern archon only)
Summon Nature's Ally I.COPY=Summon Nature's Ally I (dolphins only)
